Very low score on the Honesty scale. It indicates a pronounced tendency to lie, to embellish oneself. It can also indicate low levels of social intelligence. If given the questionnaire was used as part of a battery of methods, then the results on personality questionnaires should be recognized as unreliable.

Low score on the Honesty scale. Indicates a significant tendency to lie. He likes to embellish himself, his behavior. If the questionnaire was used as part of a battery of methods, then the results on personality questionnaires need not be considered unreliable. However, their results should be considered quite critically..
There was no tendency to lie. May be occasionally inclined to embellish himself, his behavior, but within the normal range.

High score on the Honesty scale. Such a high result can be associated not only with high personal honesty, but also a consequence of other reasons: deliberate distortion of answers, very wrong self-assessment. This result should be treated with caution.

Undoubtedly, you are extremely observant. At the same time, you are able to analyze yourself and your actions. You are able to appreciate another person with remarkable accuracy.
You have developed enough observation but still, when evaluating, sometimes prejudice fails you.

You are not too interested in what is hidden behind appearance, manner of behavior others. Although in communication you do not have any serious psychological problems. Less than 45 points. You are absolutely not interested in the innermost thoughts of those who are close to you. You are too busy, you have no time to analyze even your own actions, let alone those of others. You will not be offended if you are considered an egoist?
Are you kind and considerate to others? Are you able to give the last shirt to the one who needs it more? Our quiz will help you answer these questions.
You have money. Could you spend it all what do you have for gifts to friends?
A friend tells you about his troubles. Will you let him know that you are not interested in this, even if it is?
If your partner is bad at chess or another game, will you sometimes give in to him to please him?

You are kind, like others, know how to communicate with people. You probably have many friends. One caveat: never try to have a good relationship with everyone - you can’t please everyone, and it won’t do you any good.

Well, your kindness is a matter of chance. You are not kind to everyone. For some, you can do anything, but communication with you is more than unpleasant for those who do not like you. Its not so bad. But, probably, we should try to be equal with everyone so that people do not get offended.
Communication with you, I must admit, sometimes it happens just flour even for the people closest to you. Be kinder and you will have more friends. After all, friendship requires kindness...

This test is widely used in America to diagnose the entrepreneurial spirit.

 If a person shows some weaknesses, but retains a strong desire to own his own business and be an entrepreneur, then, according to the canons of entrepreneurship, this desire is quite feasible. But for this you need to select a team and your partners in such a way that they compensate for your weaknesses.
 For example, you do not have very high marks in "organizational ability" and "relationship with others". So, your team should have someone with the appropriate strengths.

With this test, you can easily determine whether which type of temperament dominates you. 

 To each person from birth is one of the four temperament types that change little over the course of life.


Temperament determines the strength and speed of our reactions to life events, the degree of emotionality personality and the degree of its nervous excitability. You cant change your temperament but you can learn to use not only its strong, positive, but also weak, negative, sides.


There are no people whose temperament can be 100% attributed to any particular type.

As a rule, our temperament is a mixture of the characteristics of two, and even three temperaments. Throughout life, the balance of components our temperament can change under the influence of events, experiences, various trials and errors.

The purpose of this questionnaire is to identify the level of honesty, openness of the subject. Designed for professional psychological diagnostics. 

 The Honesty Questionnaire goes well with those questionnaires that do not include a scale of lies: with low scores on the honesty scale, the results of diagnostics for other methods included in the battery of methods can be recognized as unreliable.

 The Honesty questionnaire can also be used as an independent technique designed to identify the level of honesty, the subjects openness. For example, for the purpose of selection
